inclusion.criterion: evaluation of lymph node status with sentinel lymph node procedure or full axillary dissection
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: positive involvement of 1-3 axillary lymph nodes as confirmed by histologic examination
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: candidate for treatment of their cancer with systemic chemotherapy in addition to hormonal therapy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Eligible Staging Criteria: T1-3 N1 M0
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: breast tumor must undergo central pathology review at GHI and must be found adequate for the Oncotype DX assay
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: breast tumor must be estrogen-receptor positive and HER2 positive (IHC/FISH) as per institutional guidelines
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: prior history of breast cancer in the same breast
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: newly diagnosed with more than one operable primary breast tumor
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: <2mm invasive tumor as assessed by local pathologist
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: received any kind of neoadjuvant treatment
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 45-year-old postmenopausal woman with cytologically confirmed breast cancer, HER2-positive and ER/PR negative. Axillary sampling revealed 5 positive lymph nodes.
